body:
Nothing big but I just wanted to ask what would be better out of:
a) Having 13 - 16 CPS but no blockhit
b) Having 6.5 - 8 CPS and being able to blockhit
My aim would be the same either option F.Y.I
body_tagged:
Nothing big but I just wanted to ask what would be better out of:
a) Having 13 - 16 CPS but no blockhit
b) Having 6.5 - 8 CPS and being able to blockhit
My aim would be the same either option F.Y.I
title: Need Opinions

replies.body: I would say, on Avicus, go with the blockhitting because of how far you can knock people back with it.
replies.body_tagged: I would say, on Avicus, go with the blockhitting because of how far you can knock people back with it.

replies.body: But sometimes block bitting gets a little annoying XD
replies.body_tagged: But sometimes block bitting gets a little annoying XD

replies.body: You can preform some amazing combos without block hitting.  But the first one looks like jitterclick, and I am not a big fan.  But, the bigger the cps, the better.
replies.body_tagged: You can preform some amazing combos without block hitting.  But the first one looks like jitterclick, and I am not a big fan.  But, the bigger the cps, the better.

replies.body:
It isn't jitter clicking, it's 2 left clicks :P and use button 5 as my right click. Also I play Pot PvP 75% of the time.

replies.body: 13-16 gives you more benefits imo, but if you utilize blockhitting like I do, depending on the situation, it could be more useful, but 95% of the time jitterclick, but don't over-do it and take breaks, getting carpal tunneling is Horrendous.

replies.body: Is it illegal on all servers? And why is it illegal?
replies.body_tagged: Is it illegal on all servers? And why is it illegal?

replies.body: Blockhitting.
replies.body_tagged: Blockhitting.

replies.body: This isn't why it is illegal, but it is very bad for your health and you can get problems with your hands from it.
replies.body_tagged: This isn't why it is illegal, but it is very bad for your health and you can get problems with your hands from it.

reply_to.body: Is it illegal on all servers? And why is it illegal?
reply_to.body_tagged: Is it illegal on all servers? And why is it illegal?

replies.body:
On the topic of jitter clicking, I feel the need to state some of the problems that may arise when using this tactic too often.

Arthritis;
You probably know what this is.

Carpel Tunnel Syndrome;
Carpal tunnel syndrome is a painful disorder of the hand caused by pressure on nerves that run through the wrist. Symptoms include numbness, pins and needles, and pain. Pregnancy, arthritis or repetitive hand movements can cause carpal tunnel syndrome. Splinting and medications can help, but sometimes an operation is needed.

Various muscle disorders;
These can include spasms of the muscle, twitching numbness and other side affects. Unlinke carpal tunnel, some of these muscle disorders can affect not only your arm, but other muscles, like your eyelids and mouth.

There are probably more, but I'm not going to list them all. :P

This is why I only jitter when I HAVE to.
Of course, this is just some information, you choose what you'd like to do.

NOTE; These disorders and such do not occur after jittering once, you'd have to do it extensively.
Also, these side affects can cause more serious health problems, like epilepsy.

replies.body:
actually unless arthritis runs in your family you won't get it from jitterclicking. 

do NOT jitterclick with your wrist, use bicepts. Unless you want your wrist to be f'd. 

You have to seriously overdo it to get these kinds of things as well. 
Top PvPers have been jittering for 2-4 years and have no issues because they're careful not to overdo it. 

So it has the potential, just the risk isn't as great as people think.
